alert.note: Alert for Polk; Scott (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 06 at 3:10PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Polk and Scott Counties through 345 PM CST... At 310 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Queen Wilhelmina State Park, or near Mena, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mena... Waldron... Beauchamp... Queen Wilhelmina State Park... Mountain Fork... Polk County Fairgrounds... Mena Intermountain Airport... Acorn... Rocky... Winfield... Hon... Cedar Creek... Y City... Rich Mountain... Needmore... Boles... Parks... Eagleton... Shady Grove... Elm Park... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CST for western Arkansas.
